frame.name: State_of_entity
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> is in a specified <fen>State</fen>. When not explicitly specified, the <fen>State</fen> usually concerns the <fen>Entity</fen>'s health, repair, or functioning. The <fen>State</fen> is also often assessed with an <fen>Evaluation</fen> and it may be specified to apply only to a particular <fen>Parameter</fen> of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Entity">Some of the classics</fex> <m>were</m> <m>in</m> <fex name="Evaluation">excellent</fex> <fex name="State"><t>condition</t></fex>.</ex>
<ex>She was taken home , where <fex name="Entity">her</fex> <fex name="State"><t>condition</t></fex> worsened.</ex>
<ex>They soon reduced <fex name="Entity">the Indians</fex> <m>to</m> a <t>CONDITION</t> <fex name="State">of abject slavery</fex> .</ex>
<ex>They had regressed beyond any help and could never be cured of <fex name="Entity">their</fex> <fex name="Evaluation">"bestial"</fex> <t>STATE</t> <fex name="State">of utter dependency on poor relief</fex>.</ex>
<ex>Evil is the outer result of a <fex name="Parameter">mental</fex> <t>condition</t> <fex name="State">of fear, ignorance, doubt, unbelief</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The entity whose <fen>State</fen> is specified and/or evaluated.
<ex>It was stressed that no diagnosis of <fex name="ent">my</fex> <t>state</t> of health would be made, so all she was doing was describing how she felt my 'aura' to be. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Evaluation
FE.definition:
<def-root>An assessment or characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s <fen>State</fen>.
<ex>I read a lot about the <fex name="eva">sorry</fex> <t>state</t> of music and agree that it is often hard to find good music.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: State
FE.definition:
<def-root>A relation in which the <fen>Entity</fen> participates or a property that the <fen>Entity</fen> possesses.
<ex>Despite being in a <t>state</t> <fex name="sta">of considerable disrepair</fex>, the building is surprisingly roomy inside and has a pleasant feel to it. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Parameter
FE.definition:
<def-root>A subpart or characteristic of the <fen>Entity</fen> that is in a specified <fen>State</fen>.
<ex>Our <t>state</t> <fex name="par">of mind</fex> can be the most determining factor in the achievement of our goals.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: state.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the condition of someone or something.

lexUnit.name: condition.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the state of something or someone, with regard to appearance, fitness, or working order.
